PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_UnitaryControlElementPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for history and operating schedules of thermostats. HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

PropertyDef.Name: Mode
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates operation mode corresponding to Pset_UnitaryControlTypeCommon.Mode. For example, 'HEAT', 'COOL', 'AUTO'.

PropertyDef.Name: Fan
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates fan operation where True is on, False is off, and Unknown is automatic.

PropertyDef.Name: SetPoint
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the temperature setpoint. For thermostats with setbacks or separate high and low setpoints, then the time series may contain a pair of values at each entry where the first value is the heating setpoint (low) and the second value is the cooling setpoint (high).
